name: A Chance At Love
description:
You are the producer on a new reality TV show where you have to push the drama to gain viewship. Push the Drama

A reality TV show is all about the drama! Take characters and put them into rooms with one another and watch the drama unfold with their interactions. Be careful! Too much drama, and the show will get cancelled for being too inappropriate. Too little drama, and the show will get cancelled for being too boring. Try to strike a nice balance!

Read the Contestants

Every interaction contestants have with one another could have an impact on the show's drama as well as their relationship towards one another. After filming each episode, you can use your producer notes to see how contestants are feeling about one another. Are Ty and Oli about to fight? Maybe it's time to separate them... unless that's exactly the drama boost your rating need!
